key_risks: Environmental and regulatory risks due to energy-intensive and waste-generating production processes

Financial instability concerns due to dividend cuts and suspensions

environmental_issues: High energy consumption and waste generation in TiO₂ production
Potential regulatory changes increasing compliance costs
social_issues: Dependence on global economic conditions affecting employment and production stability
governance_issues: Need for stronger governance to address environmental and financial risks

sources.title: Kronos Worldwide Inc Company Profile - Overview - GlobalData
sources.snippet: Kronos Worldwide Inc (Kronos) is a chemical company that manufactures and markets titanium dioxide (TiO2). The company's products include titanium chemicals, photocatalysts, iron salts in liquid and solid forms and TiO2 pigments for plastics, coatings, and paper. It offers products to plastic, paint, paper and decorative laminate manufacturers.
